channel.title: Changes to Russ Allbery's Web Pages
channel.description: Recent changes to Russ Allbery's web pages.

item.title: kstart 4.3
item.description: Add support for kafs by continuing with -t behavior if kafs is present. Use libkeyutils if available to isolate a command's keyring from the invoking program if running a specific command with -t. Use a better exit status when a command is killed with a signal. Use explicit_bzero to clear the password for k5start -s. Other portability fixes and updates.

item.title: Review: The Past is Red
item.description: Review of The Past is Red by Catherynne M. Valente.

item.title: Review: Black Sun
item.description: Review of Black Sun by Rebecca Roanhorse.

item.title: Review: The Galaxy, and the Ground Within
item.description: Review of The Galaxy, and the Ground Within by Becky Chambers.

item.title: Review: The Last Battle
item.description: Review of The Last Battle by C.S. Lewis.

item.title: Review: Fugitive Telemetry
item.description: Review of Fugitive Telemetry by Martha Wells.

item.title: Add finalists for the World Fantasy Award
item.description: Add the finalists for the 2021 World Fantasy Award for best novel.

item.title: Add Clarke Award nominees and Locus Award Winners
item.description: Add the nominees for the 2021 Arthur C. Clarke Award, and the winners of the 2021 Locus Awards (Network Effect by Martha Wells for best SF novel, The City We Became by N.K. Jemisin for best fantasy novel, and Elatsoe by Darcie Little Badger for best first novel).

item.title: control-archive 1.9.1
item.description: A data-only release that updates the Big Eight control signing key and removes some obsolete information about net.*.

item.title: Added web page for Big Eight control information
item.description: New web page summarizing control information for the Big Eight hierarchies with links to the control message signing keys and the PGP Moose key.
